name: Ecommerce Manager
description:
Ecommerce Manager is a simulation game in which you take control of an ecommerce site and company , Hire employees,  build features, adopt different marketing strategy , buy different vehicles to ensure the delivery of products and keep a real focus on your finance in order to become the top 1 ecommerce site and prevent bankruptcy.

DISCLAIMER : Since this game is still in early Alpha and under active development expect to see huge change in UI and game mechanics.

Join our Discord server here, if you want to be part of this game development by reporting bugs , being a tester, giving your gameplay experience or suggest new idea of features of improvement .

You can support the development of this game by buying it at your own price . Thank you .
